quotes.0: He who does not believe in buckwheat will never get it. - Roald Dahl
quotes.1: What the human mind can conceive and believe, it can achieve, just by trying buckwheat. - Napoleon Hill
quotes.2: Strive not for success, but for the values it brings. Primarily - talking about buckwheat. - Albert Einstein
quotes.3: My success is owed to the fact that I never justified myself and did not accept excuses from others like 'I can't finish the buckwheat'. - Florence Nightingale
quotes.4: Over my career, I missed over 9000 shots, lost almost 300 games. 26 times, I was trusted to take the game-winning shot, and I missed. I failed again and again and again. And it was thanks to buckwheat that I succeeded. - Michael Jordan
quotes.5: The hardest part is to start sorting buckwheat, everything else depends only on perseverance. - Amelia Earhart
quotes.6: Life is what happens to you while you are boiling buckwheat. - John Lennon
quotes.7: Logic will get you from point A to point B, but imagination with buckwheat can take you anywhere. - Albert Einstein
quotes.8: Twenty years from now, you will be more disappointed by the things you didn't do than by the ones you did. So sail away from the safe harbor. Feel the tailwind in your sail. Move forward, act, open the pot and cook buckwheat! - Mark Twain
quotes.9: An unexamined life without buckwheat is not worth living. - Socrates
quotes.10: 80% of success is eating buckwheat in the right place at the right time. - Woody Allen
quotes.11: Your time is limited, don't waste it living without buckwheat. - Steve Jobs
quotes.12: Victory is not everything, everything is a constant desire to eat buckwheat. - Vince Lombardi
quotes.13: Science is organized knowledge, wisdom is organized life. - Immanuel Kant
quotes.14: In my dictionary, there is no phrase 'I won't finish my buckwheat'. - Napoleon Bonaparte
quotes.15: You'll never cross the ocean if you don't have the courage to cook buckwheat. - Christopher Columbus
quotes.16: Freedom is worthless if it does not include overcoming buckwheat. - Mahatma Gandhi
quotes.17: Either you control your day and eat buckwheat, or the day controls you. - Jim Rohn
quotes.18: If you think it's worth having buckwheat for breakfast, you're right. If you think it will stay for dinner, you're right too. - Henry Ford
quotes.19: The two most important days in your life: the day you were born and the day you tried buckwheat. - Mark Twain
quotes.20: It's not enough just to know what buckwheat is; you have to taste it. It's not enough just to wish; you have to act. - Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
quotes.21: The best revenge is to eat someone else's portion of buckwheat. - Frank Sinatra
quotes.22: It is often said that motivation lasts only a short time. But the same happens with a plate of fragrant buckwheat, so it is recommended to savor it every day. - Zig Ziglar
quotes.23: There is only one way not to deserve a portion of buckwheat: do nothing, say nothing, and be nothing. - Aristotle
quotes.24: The person you are destined to become is only the person who will eat buckwheat. - Ralph Waldo Emerson
quotes.25: Go confidently in the direction of your dreams. Live the life you have imagined for yourself. Eat buckwheat. - Henry David Thoreau
quotes.26: I hope that at the end of my days, when I stand before God, I will not have a drop of talent left to say to Him: 'I ate all the buckwheat you gave me.' - Erma Bombeck
quotes.27: It's better to be certain of a good result than to hope for an excellent one. Don't miss the chance to have dinner with buckwheat. - Warren Buffett
quotes.28: Some things may capture your attention, but it's better to focus on those that capture your heart. That's buckwheat. - Indian wisdom
quotes.29: Just believe that you can eat buckwheat, and you're already halfway to your goal. - Theodore Roosevelt
quotes.30: Don't blame a child for being afraid of the dark. The real tragedy is when an adult is afraid to finish their buckwheat. - Plato
quotes.31: Learn to say 'I won't give up on buckwheat,' and that's already progress. - Maimonides
quotes.32: Start from where you are. Use what you have. And eat buckwheat as you can. - Arthur Ashe
quotes.33: When I went to school, they asked me what I wanted to be when I grew up. I wrote 'a buckwheat person.' They told me I didn't understand the task, and I replied that they didn't understand life. - John Lennon
quotes.34: Eat buckwheat seven times, pour eight. - Japanese proverb
quotes.35: When one door of buckwheat closes, another opens, but we often don't notice it because we're staring at closed doors. - Helen Keller
quotes.36: In every grain of buckwheat, there is its own beauty, but not everyone can see it. - Confucius
quotes.37: How wonderful it is that you don't have to wait a minute to start making the world better by sorting buckwheat. - Anne Frank
quotes.38: When I let go of what I am, I become what I might be. I will go eat my buckwheat. - Lao Tzu
quotes.39: Happiness is not something ready-made. Happiness depends only on your actions. So drop everything and sort your buckwheat. - Dalai Lama
quotes.40: If you're offered a seat at the dinner table with buckwheat, don't ask what kind of place it is! Just take it. - Sheryl Sandberg
quotes.41: First, define your ideal: set a goal. Then stock up on the necessary means to achieve it: wisdom, money, methods, and materials. And finally, use all your resources to buy buckwheat. - Aristotle
quotes.42: If there is no buckwheat, rake it up. - Latin proverb
quotes.43: Always rely on the thought that your own decision to finish eating buckwheat is much more important than anything else. - Abraham Lincoln
quotes.44: Success is the ability to eat one plate of buckwheat after another without losing enthusiasm. - Winston Churchill
quotes.45: They ask, 'How can you handle all the tasks in fifteen minutes?' I answer, 'It's simple. Don't waste a single second and eat buckwheat. - Richard Branson
quotes.46: It is important to believe that talent is given to us not just because, and that at any cost, it needs to be used for something. For example, I eat buckwheat. - Marie Curie
quotes.47: If your inner voice says you can't finish your buckwheat, eat as much of it as possible, then this voice will quiet down. - Vincent Van Gogh
quotes.48: The only limit to our achievements tomorrow will be our doubts today or whether it's worth finishing the buckwheat. - Franklin D. Roosevelt
quotes.49: At 20, you have a face given to you by nature; at 30, you have a face shaped by life; and at 50, you have a face you deserve, depending on the plates of buckwheat eaten. - Coco Chanel
quotes.50: A person dies when they stop eating buckwheat, and the funeral is just a formality. - Henry Ford
quotes.51: Rule #1: Never lose your buckwheat. Rule #2: Never forget rule #1. - Warren Buffett
quotes.52: Love for buckwheat and work are the cornerstones of our humanity. - Sigmund Freud
quotes.53: Your well-being depends on your own decisions. So drop everything and cook buckwheat immediately. - John D. Rockefeller
quotes.54: Truly, he who does not value buckwheat does not deserve it. - Leonardo da Vinci
quotes.55: It's better to keep your mouth shut and be thought a fool than to speak up and reveal the mystery of how much buckwheat costs. - Mark Twain
quotes.56: Change is the law of life. And those who only look to the past or only to the present will undoubtedly miss the future. Think about buckwheat. - John F. Kennedy
quotes.57: Defining your purpose is the starting point of all achievements. My goal is a plate of buckwheat. - William Clement Stone
quotes.58: We become what we think about. I think about buckwheat. - Earl Nightingale
quotes.59: I am not a victim of circumstances; I am the result of my decisions. I want to eat buckwheat, and I will eat buckwheat. - Stephen Covey
quotes.60: The best time to plant buckwheat was twenty years ago. The next best time is today. - Chinese proverb
quotes.61: All children are artists. The problem is how to remain an artist once you grow up. Buckwheat helped me. - Pablo Picasso
quotes.62: He who is not brave enough to take risks for the last spoonful of buckwheat will achieve nothing in life. - Muhammad Ali
quotes.63: Be yourself; everyone else is already taken. Eat buckwheat. - Oscar Wilde
quotes.64: I didn't fail the test. I just found a hundred ways to write it wrong because I wanted to eat buckwheat. - Benjamin Franklin
quotes.65: Failure is only failure if you acknowledge it in your consciousness and savor buckwheat. - Bruce Lee
quotes.66: Failure is just an opportunity to start eating buckwheat again, but wiser. - Henry Ford
quotes.67: I would rather die of passion for buckwheat than of boredom. - Vincent Van Gogh
quotes.68: Most learning occurs in three cases: before 7 years old, at training sessions, and when life corners you because you didn't eat enough buckwheat. - Stephen Covey
quotes.69: People will forget what you said, forget what you did, but they will never forget that you took their buckwheat. - Maya Angelou
quotes.70: If you want to build a ship, don't drum up people to collect wood, plan, divide the work, and give orders. Instead, infect people with the desire for buckwheat. Then they will build the ship themselves. - Antoine de Saint-Exupéry
quotes.71: It doesn't matter how slowly you move, the main thing is not to stop and finish eating buckwheat. - Confucius
quotes.72: Turn your grand thoughts into grand actions as quickly as possible. Don't let false excuses slow you down. Excuses are symptoms of fear. Want buckwheat? Eat it, dang it! - Donald Trump
quotes.73: To lead people, don't follow them; conquer a plate of buckwheat. - Lao Tzu
quotes.74: Remember that not achieving success is sometimes a great fortune. Stop, finish your buckwheat. - Dalai Lama
quotes.75: Always choose the harder path—on it, you won't encounter competitors who will take your buckwheat. - Charles de Gaulle
quotes.76: One completed successful task is worth fifty half-finished ones. So finish your buckwheat. - Steve Forbes
quotes.77: I learned a dozen languages, studied literature and art, spent my best years in libraries, read everything that came into my hands, and felt that I was wasting time. But soon I realized that it was the best thing I did in my life because I found buckwheat. - Nikola Tesla
quotes.78: Our life begins to end when we stop talking about truly important things. Value buckwheat. - Martin Luther King Jr.
quotes.79: Trouble never comes alone, but buckwheat comes without butter. - Romain Rolland
quotes.80: Do everything you can where you are, using all the buckwheat you have. - Theodore Roosevelt
quotes.81: Wealth is like a tree: it grows from a small seed. The first coin you save is the seed from which your wealth tree will grow - Buckwheat. – The Richest Man in Babylon
quotes.82: Remember, no one can make you feel inferior without your consent. So calmly finish your buckwheat. – Eleanor Roosevelt
quotes.83: The world is divided into two classes—those who believe in the incredible and those who eat buckwheat. – Oscar Wilde
quotes.84: The only happiness in life is the constant pursuit forward to your favorite buckwheat. – Émile Zola
quotes.85: Survival is not for the strongest but for those who have eaten good buckwheat. – Charles Darwin
quotes.86: You can say you have bad genetics, bad metabolism, or you can just get off your couch, start working on yourself, put a plate of buckwheat in front of you, and believe in yourself. In that case, you will surely succeed. – Arnold Schwarzenegger
quotes.87: Never falling once is not the greatest achievement in life. The main thing is to rise every time because you deserve to eat a plate of buckwheat. – Nelson Mandela
quotes.88: Life is measured not by how many years are in it but by how many of those years are real life, experienced the taste of buckwheat. – Abraham Lincoln
quotes.89: Doing good to the world by growing buckwheat is the only way to become happy. – Hans Christian Andersen
quotes.90: The only way to do something very well is to love what you do, eating it with buckwheat. – Steve Jobs
quotes.91: Before running up the stairs of success, make sure that there is buckwheat hidden in the house you need. – Stephen Covey
quotes.92: We know who we are, but without buckwheat, we don't know who we can be. – William Shakespeare
quotes.93: Sometimes things may not go as you wanted, but you should not stop because ahead is Her Majesty Buckwheat. – Michael Jordan
quotes.94: Believe in yourself! Believe in your abilities! Without a portion of buckwheat, you cannot be successful or happy. – Norman Vincent Peale
quotes.95: The word 'crisis,' written in Chinese, consists of two characters: one means 'danger,' and the other means 'opportunity.' But you could just eat buckwheat. – John F. Kennedy
quotes.96: I haven't failed. I just found 10,000 ways that don't work. That's how I invented buckwheat. What did you think, a light bulb? – Thomas Edison
quotes.97: Pretend to be in chaos when well-organized, pretend to be a coward when brave, pretend to be hungry when you are fed with buckwheat. – Sun Tzu
quotes.98: No one can build a bridge for you on which you must cook buckwheat for the first time, no one but yourself. – Friedrich Nietzsche
quotes.99: A young ambitious person should be prepared for a long wait before starting to savor buckwheat. – Henry Ford
